name: Gecko Crawl
description:
A Block-Placing Puzzle Game

The snake moves forwards automatically, turning left when it hits an obstacle. Click to place obstacles and guide it to the exit.

Don't let the snake crash into itself, or into any red blocks.

Controls:
  • Click to place blocks
  • Space to pause/resume
  • Up/Down arrows to adjust speed.

Made with Godot.

Read more about my plans for the game here.
